lead_paragraph: Buster Keaton takes to the sea in the slapstick silent comedy classic "Steamboat Bill, Jr." (1928). A college kid (Keaton) joins his dad on the Mississippi River just in time for a hurricane. With Tom McGuire and Ernest Torrence.
snippet: Buster Keaton takes to the sea in the slapstick silent comedy classic "Steamboat Bill, Jr." (1928). A college kid (Keaton) joins his dad on the Mississippi River just in time for a hurricane. With Tom McGuire and Ernest Torrence.
